metadata.title: CVE-2023-2908 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference issue was found in Libtiff's tif_dir.c file.This issue may allow an attacker to pass a crafted TIFF image file to thetiffcp utility which triggers a runtime error that causes undefinedbehavior. This will result in an application crash, eventually leading to adenial of service.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
